Class ScoreTracker

  • java.lang.Object
    • ScoreTracker

  • public class ScoreTracker
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to keep track of multiple player scores.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ScoreTracker​()
      Default Constructor sets up the stage for Score Tracker

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      javafx.stage.Stage getStage​()
      Calling getStage returns the primary stage for ScoreTracker.
      javafx.scene.Scene updatePlayerScene​()
      Calling updatePlayerScene updates the Score Scene by reconstructing the VBox and Scene.
      boolean validateInteger​(java.lang.String inputStr)
      Calling validateInteger parses String input and return its validity as a potential integer value.

      • getStage

        public javafx.stage.Stage getStage​()
        Calling getStage returns the primary stage for ScoreTracker.

      • validateInteger

        public boolean validateInteger​(java.lang.String inputStr)
        Calling validateInteger parses String input and return its validity as a potential integer value.
        Parameters:
        inputStr - is the string that is going to be validated as an Integer.
        Returns:
        boolean

      • updatePlayerScene

        public javafx.scene.Scene updatePlayerScene​()
        Calling updatePlayerScene updates the Score Scene by reconstructing the VBox and Scene. It uses new HashMap data to add items.
        Returns:
        Scene Object
